DOC.detailed_description: A study effect side effect ProOxy facial spray do . Sixty people select approved participate study . Pictures face ( frontal , leave side right side ) take upon acceptance , treatment 4,8 12 week interval .
DOC.criteria: patient acne face patient least 18 year age patient normal disease free skin dorsal surface upper arm . patient willing follow instruction Patch Test Part one Part Two procedure follow schedule visit . Exclusion Criteria patient systemic illness ( limited heart disease , hypertension , diabetes , cancer , liver disease , kidney disease ) patient dark skin color , Fitzpatrick skin type VVI , prone post=inflammatory hyperpigmentation . patient intake oral medication include glucocorticoid immunosuppressant undergone ultraviolet phototherapy past 2 week prior patch test . patient history contact dermatitis , dermatographism anaphylaxis . patient history eczematous inflammatory dermatitis , seborrheic dermatitis psoriasis .
